name: Grimreign
description:
Grimreign is an atmospheric dungeon crawler experience with a focus on exploration and loot gathering. Take on the role of a semi-mad scientist named Dr. Wiley with a love for inventing strange and sometimes useless tools. Due to unfortunate events involving some pesky insects, Dr. Wiley needs to shrink himself to the size of a bug in order to rid the infections from his daughter’s favorite tree before it dies!

Features:

  • Battle your way through a bug infested tree to heal it from the reign of insects!
  • Collect unique weapons made from parts of the bugs you've defeated to use against them.
  • Collect xp to try and get a higher score!
  • Keep your lantern lit by killing bugs or the darkness will overwhelm you... or the bugs will.
  • Eliminate the queen to rid the tree of its invaders.
